title-group.article-title: COMPOSITE LEGENDRE-LAGUERRE APPROXIMATION IN UNBOUNDED DOMAINS

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2001 ICMSEC, Chinese Academy of Sciences and VSP

abstract.p: Composite Legendre-Laguerre approximation in unbounded domains is developed. Some approximation results are obtained. As an example, a composite spectral scheme is provided for the Burgers equation on the half line. The stability and convergence of proposed scheme are proved strictly. Two-dimensional exterior problems are discussed.
